# storefrontCountryCodes

**Type**

A list of storefront country codes you provide to limit the storefronts for a subscription-renewal-date extension.

## Declaration

```swift
[storefrontCountryCode] storefrontCountryCodes
```

## Discussion

You provide the list of storefront country codes in the [doc://com.apple.appstoreserverapi/documentation/AppStoreServerAPI/MassExtendRenewalDateRequest] to limit the storefronts in which the App Store extends the subscription renewal date. To indicate that the extension applies in all storefronts, omit the [doc://com.apple.appstoreserverapi/documentation/AppStoreServerAPI/storefrontCountryCodes] object from the [doc://com.apple.appstoreserverapi/documentation/AppStoreServerAPI/MassExtendRenewalDateRequest] object.

## Data types

- **extendByDays**: The number of days to extend the subscription renewal date.
- **extendReasonCode**: The code that represents the reason for the subscription-renewal-date extension.
- **productId**: The product identifier of the In-App Purchase.
- **requestIdentifier**: A string that contains a unique identifier you provide to track each subscription-renewal-date extension request.
- **storefrontCountryCode**: The three-letter code that represents the country or region associated with the App Store storefront.
